publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-329.2.1 Carolyn Leckie: Treatment of Asylum Seekers in Scotland-As an amendment to amendment (S2M-329.2) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from first "notes" to "United Kingdom" and insert "recognises that the Scottish Executive was assured that Dungavel Immigration Removal Centre would be a short-term detention centre and regrets that this assurance has been broken".
